Package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace

Interface DirectD65Conversion

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdobeRgbColorSpace, LabColorSpace, LinearRgb65ColorSpace, LuvColorSpace, sRgbColorSpace, XYZ50ColorSpace, XYZ65ColorSpace
    public interface DirectD65Conversion
    This interface specifies methods toCIEXYZ65(float[]) and fromCIEXYZ65(float[]) for direct conversion between the color space's native color values and D65 XYZ-coordinates. This is useful for color spaces that are D65-based by avoiding additional conversions to and from D50-based PCS.
    Version:
    2022/11/15

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static ChromaticAdaptation catD50toD65  
      static ChromaticAdaptation catD65toD50  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      float[] fromCIEXYZ​(float[] value)  
      default float[] fromCIEXYZ65​(float[] xyz65)
      Analogous to fromCIEXYZ(float[]) but accepts D65-based instead of D50-based PCS color values.
      float[] fromRGB​(float[] value)  
      float[] toCIEXYZ​(float[] value)  
      default float[] toCIEXYZ65​(float[] value)
      Analogous to toCIEXYZ(float[]) but returns D65-based instead of D50-based PCS color values.
      float[] toRGB​(float[] value)

      • toCIEXYZ

      • toRGB

      • fromRGB

        float[] fromRGB​(float[] value)

      • fromCIEXYZ65

        default float[] fromCIEXYZ65​(float[] xyz65)
        Analogous to fromCIEXYZ(float[]) but accepts D65-based instead of D50-based PCS color values. D65-based color spaces should override this method to avoid the additional D65 to D50 conversion.
        Parameters:
        xyz65 - D65-based XYZ color values
        Returns:
        color values in this color space

      • toCIEXYZ65

        default float[] toCIEXYZ65​(float[] value)
        Analogous to toCIEXYZ(float[]) but returns D65-based instead of D50-based PCS color values. D65-based color spaces should override this method to avoid the additional D50 to D65 conversion.
        Parameters:
        value - color value in this color space
        Returns:
        D65-based XYZ color values
